Class Playing

java.lang.Object
Gamestates.State
Gamestates.Playing
All Implemented Interfaces:
StateMethods
public class Playing extends State implements StateMethods
Playing class is a subclass of State and implements StateMethods interface. This class is responsible for handling the game state when the player is playing the game.
